availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Joseph Paul (Newport, Campbell County, Kentucky, locksmith.)

body.p: Campbell County, Kentucky, locksmith. Native of France. Married to Apollonia Becht Paul in Hamilton County, Ohio, on January 7, 1848. Father of Caroline "Carrie" Paul, Louis J. Paul, Joseph Paul, Anna Paul Krutchen, and Lena Paul Burger Brand. Locksmith in Newport, Campbell County, Kentucky, in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Campbell County, Newport, p. 526.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Ohio, Hamilton County, Cincinnati Ward 13, p. 221B.
Ohio Marriage Records, 1774-1993, Hamilton County Marriages, Film #000344460, p. 182.
